meanings.definition: A joke exploiting the different possible meanings of a word or the fact that there are words that sound alike but have different meanings.
meanings.sent1: She giggled at the clever puns in the book.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys creating puns to make people laugh.
meanings.sent3: The puns in the comedy show had everyone chuckling.
meanings.sent4: His puns were like little riddles waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The puns added a touch of humor to the conversation.

meanings.definition: Make a joke exploiting the different possible meanings of a word.
meanings.sent1: They puns about the homonyms in the English language.
meanings.sent2: She puns cleverly during her stand-up routine.
meanings.sent3: He puns so much that his friends roll their eyes playfully.
meanings.sent4: Punning his way through the speech, he kept the audience engaged.
meanings.sent5: The comedian puns effortlessly, making the audience burst into laughter.
